channel.title: INtravel
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Now live: United-JetBlue 'Blue Sky' partnership begins with earning, redeeming on either airline
item.description: United Airlines and JetBlue launched their new "Blue Sky" partnership, offering the earning and redeeming of miles across both airlines.

item.title: Delta Air Lines unveils meals by celebrity chef José Andrés
item.description: After months of fine-tuning menus and several recipe iterations, Delta One and domestic first-class passengers are in for a treat.

item.title: Air France to launch new route from Las Vegas to Paris in 2026
item.description: Air France is launching new nonstop service from Las Vegas' Harry Reid International Airport (LAS) to Paris-Charles de Gaulle Airport (CDG) in 2026 as...

item.title: $150 Squarespace credit added to American Express Business Gold Card
item.description: Amex Business Gold Card members now get up to $150 in annual statement credits for U.S. Squarespace purchases, helping offset the card's $375 annual f...

item.title: 9 destinations that are best seen on a guided or small-group tour — including some you wouldn’t expect
item.description: Touring as a group instead of on your own can pay off in these iconic destinations.
